content.name: bowl
content.label: Bowl
content.gloss: a round, deep dish or basin used for food or liquid

content.name: containing_things
content.label: Stuffs contained
content.gloss: the food or liquid contained in the bowl

content.name: liquid
content.label: Liquid
content.gloss: a substance that flows freely but is of constant volume

content.name: food
content.label: Food
content.gloss: any nutritious substance that people or animals eat
